column2: According to my calculations, we have a 69.8925% chance of surviving this.
We need a bonesaw over here!
You are the medical officer on duty!
Everyone move! Form up on your positons!
According to my calculations, we now have a 42.005% chance of surviving this.
You might as well flip a damn coin.
THINGS THE COIN FLIP CAN INTERUPT
A coin flip chances the fates
I say, give us a flip!
